feature_defs.trigger: on each of your turns while your Rage is active
effects: The first creature you hit with a weapon or unarmed strike takes extra damage equal to 1d6 + half your Barbarian level (round down).
You choose necrotic or radiant damage each time you deal the extra damage.
You have a pool of d12s equal to 4 + your Barbarian level increases (5 at level 6, 6 at level 12, 7 at level 17).
You expend dice from the pool, roll them, and regain hit points equal to the total.
limits: You regain all expended dice when you finish a long rest.

feature_defs.trigger: once per active Rage when you fail a saving throw
effects: You can reroll the saving throw with a bonus equal to your Rage Damage bonus; you must use the new roll.
Up to ten other creatures of your choice within 60 feet gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of your next turn.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you expend a use of your Rage (no action required) to restore its use.

effects: You can assume a divine warrior form for 1 minute or until you drop to 0 hit points.
Flight: you have a fly speed equal to your speed and can hover.
Resistance: you have resistance to necrotic, psychic, and radiant damage.
Revivification: when a creature within 30 feet would drop to 0 hit points, you can use your reaction and expend a Rage use to instead set its hit points to a number equal to your Barbarian level.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant do so again until you finish a long rest.
